Orebit Technical Resources

Comprehensive Guides for Geological Data Analysis

Comprehensive guides for mastering geological data analysis with Orebit’s R Shiny applications. Learn workflows, best practices, and advanced techniques for GeoDataViz, resource estimation, and mine optimization.

Featured Application Guides

GeoDataViz: Complete User Guide

Master Exploratory Data Analysis
Learn how to use GeoDataViz for comprehensive geological data validation, statistical analysis, and 3D visualization. Perfect for geologists working with drillhole datasets.

Advanced Data Preprocessing with GeoDataViz

Prepare Data for Resource Estimation
Complete workflow for transforming raw drillhole data into estimation-ready datasets using GeoDataViz’s preprocessing tools.

Getting Started with Orebit Solutions

Introduction to Orebit Ecosystem
Discover how Orebit’s suite of R Shiny applications transforms geological workflows from exploration to production.
